name: FartKnight
description:
Controls:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move

Press SPACE to attack with farts

Wait to reload

Pick up items and progress in the game

Summary: 

Fartknight was conceived as an arcade-style roguelike shooter with a fun and intriguing twist. The game mechanics revolve around farting which gives a lot of creative freedom (weapon shoots backwards and is gaseous, different foods give abilities, etc.) and is an enticingly hilarious idea for prospective players.
